# load TASA dataset
```{r}
tasa_dat <- readxl::read_excel("../../../../MetaPac_Phase_II_results/KLUM-0202-21TASA_CDT/KLUM-0202-21TASA_CDT.xlsx")

## subset data
tasa_dat <- tasa_dat %>%
  janitor::clean_names("none") %>%
  mutate(Result=as.numeric(Result))
```

## replace names to ids
```{r}
n12_met_id <- readxl::read_excel("../../../../12_met_signatures_id/metabolites_to_ids.xlsx")

tasa_dat <- tasa_dat %>%
  mutate(Metabolite_Name = n12_met_id$Metabolite_ID[match(Analyte, n12_met_id$Metabolite_Name)])
```

## process dataset
```{r}
## convert Unique_Tube_Label_ID to chracters
tasa_dat$Unique_Tube_Label_ID <- as.character(as.numeric(tasa_dat$Unique_Tube_Label_ID))

## clear patient Names
tasa_dat$LB01SDV__LB03 <- as.character(gsub("^.{3}|.{3}$", "", tasa_dat$Unique_Tube_Label_ID))

tasa_dat <- tasa_dat %>%
  dplyr::select(LB01SDV__LB03, Metabolite_Name, Result) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = "Metabolite_Name", values_from = "Result")
```

# process metadata
```{r}
metadata <- readRDS("../../MetaData/metadata_final/processed_metadata/metadata_flatten_df_cumm_diagnosis.rds")

SAMPLE_ANALYSIS_DATE <- as.Date("20210617", "%Y%m%d") ## date of final report

banner("patients accessed for eligibilility")
screening <- metadata %>%
  filter(CPEVENT == "V0 SCREENING") %>%
  distinct(PT) %>%
  unlist()

print(length(screening))

banner("patients recruited")
baseline <- metadata %>%
  filter(CPEVENT == "V1 BASELINE") %>%
  distinct(PT) %>%
  unlist()

print(length(baseline))

banner("patient excluded")
excluded <- setdiff(screening, baseline)
print(length(excluded))

banner("patient excluded -- reason")

excluded_reason <- metadata %>%
  filter(CPEVENT == "V0 SCREENING") %>%
  filter(PT %in% excluded) %>%
  dplyr::select_if(~sum(!is.na(.)) > 0)

print(excluded)

## 

## process metadata
metadata_baseline <- metadata %>%
  filter(CPEVENT == "V1 BASELINE") %>%
  mutate(DM__DMDAT=as.Date(DM__DMDAT, "%Y%m%d"), 
         MH02__MH274DAT=as.Date(MH02__MH274DAT, "%Y%m%d")) %>%
  mutate(SAMPLE_STORAGE=as.numeric(difftime(SAMPLE_ANALYSIS_DATE, DM__DMDAT, units="days")),
         Diabetes_diag=as.numeric(difftime(DM__DMDAT,MH02__MH274DAT, units="days"))) %>%
  dplyr::select(PT, 
         LB01SDV__LB03, 
         `LB03__CA19-9_U/ml`, 
         DM__AGEDIAG,
         DM__BMI,
         DM__SEX,
         SAMPLE_STORAGE, 
         MH07SDV__MH16,
         cummulative_diagnosis,
         MH02__MH273YN,
         MH07SDV__MH142YN,
         Diabetes_diag) %>%
  mutate(`LB03__CA19-9_U/ml`=as.numeric(`LB03__CA19-9_U/ml`),
         DM__BMI=as.numeric(DM__BMI))


print("family predisposition")
table(metadata_baseline$MH07SDV__MH142YN)


metadata_baseline_DM <- metadata_baseline %>%
  filter(MH02__MH273YN %in% c("NA, Y","Y")) %>%
  mutate(DM_status = "DM2",
         DM_status = if_else(Diabetes_diag < 365, "NODM", NA_character_))


table(metadata_baseline_DM$DM_status)
print("diabetes")
nrow(metadata_baseline_DM)


metadata_baseline <- metadata_baseline %>%
  dplyr::select(PT, LB01SDV__LB03, cummulative_diagnosis, `LB03__CA19-9_U/ml`,MH07SDV__MH16) %>%
  rename("CA19_9" = "LB03__CA19-9_U/ml") %>%
  mutate(Disease_status = ifelse(cummulative_diagnosis == "Pankreaskarzinom", "PDAC", "CP")) 
```

# combine data
```{r}
## merge datasets
merged_data <-  merge(tasa_dat, metadata_baseline, by = "LB01SDV__LB03")

banner("patients analysed")
analyzed <- merged_data %>%
  distinct(PT) %>%
  unlist()

print(length(analyzed))

banner("patient dropouts")
dropout <- setdiff(baseline, analyzed)
print(length(dropout))

banner("patient excluded -- reason")

dropout_reason <- metadata %>%
  filter(CPEVENT == "V1 BASELINE") %>%
  filter(PT %in% dropout) %>%
  dplyr::select_if(~sum(!is.na(.)) > 0)

print(dropout)



## primary analysed
banner("patients analysed")
prim_analyzed <- merged_data %>%
  drop_na(cummulative_diagnosis) %>%
  distinct(PT) %>%
  unlist()

print(length(prim_analyzed))

banner("patient dropouts -- others")
dropout <- setdiff(analyzed, prim_analyzed)
print(length(dropout))

# primary analysed
banner("patients analysed")
prim_analyzed_wo_ca199 <- merged_data %>%
  drop_na(cummulative_diagnosis, CA19_9) %>%
  distinct(PT) %>%
  unlist()

print(length(prim_analyzed_wo_ca199))

banner("patient dropouts -- no CA19.9")
dropout <- setdiff(prim_analyzed, prim_analyzed_wo_ca199)
print(length(dropout))

merged_data <- merged_data %>%
  drop_na(cummulative_diagnosis, CA19_9)

banner("cummulatative diagnosis")

diagnosis <- merged_data %>%
  group_by(cummulative_diagnosis) %>%
  distinct(PT) %>%
  tally() %>%
  ungroup()

knitr::kable(diagnosis)

# ## impute missing CA19.9
library(mice)
h1 <- ggplot(merged_data, aes(x = log10(CA19_9))) +
  geom_histogram(fill = "red4", color = "#000000", position = "identity") +
  ggtitle("Original distribution") +
  theme_classic()

merged_data$CA19_9 <- complete(mice(merged_data, method = "cart"))$CA19_9

h2 <- ggplot(merged_data, aes(x = log10(CA19_9))) +
  geom_histogram(fill = "green4", color = "#000000", position = "identity") +
  ggtitle("Imputed distribution") +
  theme_classic()

p <- cowplot::plot_grid(h1, h2, nrow = 1, ncol = 2)

print(p)

merged_data <- merged_data %>%
  mutate(predCA19_9= ifelse(CA19_9 < 37, "CP", "PDAC"),
         LewisAg = ifelse(CA19_9 < 10, "Negative", "Positive"))

## save merged data
saveRDS(merged_data, "results/merged_TASA_data.rds")

```

## center specific stats
```{r}
city_id <- read.csv("../../MetaData/metadata_final/city_id.csv", sep = ";")

## prccess center data
center_data <- metadata %>%
  filter(CPEVENT == "V0 SCREENING") %>%
  mutate(CENTER = as.integer(gsub('.{3}$', '', PT))) %>%
  group_by(CENTER) %>%
  distinct(PT) %>%
  tally() %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  full_join(city_id, by = "CENTER")
  
## germany map
germany <- getData(country = "Germany", level = 1)

world_cord <- read.csv("../../MetaData/metadata_final/simplemaps_worldcities_basicv1/worldcities.csv", sep = ";") %>%
  filter(country == "Germany")

center_data <- left_join(center_data, world_cord, by= c("CITY_NAME"= "city"))

## modify labels for overlapping cities
## Munich_Bochum
munich_bochum <- data.frame(CITY_NAME = c("Munich", "Munich","Munich","Munich","Munich", "Bochum"),
                     CITY_COMPLETE=c("LMU", "Bogenhausen","Neuparlach","TUM (Surgery)","TUM (Gastro)", "RUB"),
                     lat = c(48.110730, 48.147499, 48.139130, 48.135440, 48.126799, 51.4677899),
                     lng = c(11.467560, 11.628280, 11.580220, 11.598350, 11.600275, 7.2097899))

center_data1 <- merge(center_data, munich_bochum, by = c("CITY_NAME", "CITY_COMPLETE"), all = TRUE)

center_data1$lat <- ifelse(!is.na(center_data1$lat.y), center_data1$lat.y, center_data1$lat.x)
center_data1$lng <- ifelse(!is.na(center_data1$lng.y), center_data1$lng.y, center_data1$lng.x)

center_data1 <- center_data1[, !colnames(center_data1) %in% c("lat.x", "lng.x", "lat.y", "lng.y")]
  

## plot data
p <- center_data1  %>%
  ggplot() +
   geom_polygon(
    data = germany,
    aes(long, lat, group = group),
    colour = "#b2b2b2",
    fill = "#79AF97FF",
    alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_point(aes(x=lng, 
             y=lat,
             size=n),
             position=position_jitter(h=0.1, w=0.1),
             shape=21, 
             colour="black",
             fill= "#B24745FF") +
  coord_map() +
  ggrepel::geom_text_repel(aes(x=lng, 
             y=lat,
             label = CITY_COMPLETE),
             position=position_jitter(h=0.1, w=0.1),
             point.padding = 0.1,
             size= 2) +
  labs(size="Number of \nPatients") +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")

print(p)

ggsave(filename = "results/patient_distribution.pdf",
      plot = p,
      width=3,
      height= 4,
      dpi=300)

```

## column names
column_names <- readRDS("../../MetaData/metadata_final/processed_metadata/master_table.rds")


dat <- metadata %>%
    filter(CPEVENT == "V1 BASELINE") %>%
    filter(PT %in% prim_analyzed_wo_ca199) %>%
    dplyr::select(-any_of(drop_cols)) %>%
    dplyr::select(where( ~ !all(is.na(.x)))) %>%
    dplyr::select(-contains("TXT")) %>%
    dplyr::select(-contains("DAT")) %>%
    dplyr::select(-contains("DAT_")) %>%
    dplyr::select(-contains("_EXC")) %>%
    mutate(across(any_of(num_variables), as.numeric)) %>%
    dplyr::select_if(~ !all(is.na(.)))

cat_variables <- setdiff(colnames(dat), num_variables)

for (k in cat_variables) {
    
    dat[[k]] <-
      gsub("NA|NA, |, NA", "", dat[[k]])
    
}

labels <- list()

for (j in 1:nrow(column_names)) {
  matched_name <- unlist(column_names[j, "lookup_var"])
  replacements <- unlist(column_names[j, "Label"])
    
  label <- setNames(replacements, matched_name)
    
  labels <- append(labels, label)
  
}

# set documents properties
sect_properties <- prop_section(
  page_size(width = 21, height = 29.7, orient = "portrait"),
  type = "continuous",
  page_margins = page_mar()
)

## create summary table 
summaryStat <- dat %>% 
  mutate(cummulative_diagnosis = if_else(is.na(cummulative_diagnosis), "Others", cummulative_diagnosis)) %>%
  tbl_summary(by = cummulative_diagnosis,
              type = all_continuous() ~ "continuous2",
              label = labels,
              statistic = list(all_categorical() ~ "{n}/{N} ({p}%)",
                               all_continuous() ~ "{median} ({p25}-{p75})"),
              digits = all_continuous() ~ 1,
              missing = "no") %>% 
  add_n() %>%
  bold_labels() %>% 
  as_flex_table() 

summaryStat

)

# Save as Word document
